tasks.title: Phase 6: Build Native Spreadsheet Editor Integration

tasks.details:
Build a high-performance spreadsheet editor as the sole DatabaseBlock view:
- Glide Data Grid (MIT license) for 60fps canvas rendering supporting 100M+ rows
- HyperFormula engine (GPL-v3) providing 386 Excel functions with dependency tracking
- DuckDB WASM for client-side SQL queries and data storage
- Web Workers architecture: DuckDB Worker, HyperFormula Worker, Parser Worker
- OpenAI integration for natural language to SQL/formula conversion
- Builds upon Task 81's virtual scrolling implementation

SIMPLIFIED ARCHITECTURE:
- DatabaseBlock component directly renders SpreadsheetView (no view switching)
- Spreadsheet is the default and only view - no Kanban, Gallery, Calendar, Timeline, or Analytics views
- Single DOM overlay <input> for cell editing with optimistic updates
- Canvas-based rendering to avoid DOM reflows

KEY FEATURES:
- Cell editing with <16ms frame time
- Excel-compatible formulas (A1 notation)
- Column-level formulas and computed columns
- Copy/paste from Excel (TSV format)
- Full keyboard navigation
- CSV/XLSX streaming import via workers
- AI-powered column generation and chart creation
- Reference tables in chat with @tableName syntax

PERFORMANCE TARGETS:
- 60fps scrolling with 10K+ rows
- Canvas-based rendering to avoid DOM reflows
- Lazy loading via SQL LIMIT/OFFSET
- Only render 20-30 visible rows at a time
- Worker-based parsing to prevent main thread blocking
